problem_names: lemma map2_empty_iff[simp]: "map2 f xs ys = [] \<longleftrightarrow> xs = [] \<or> ys = []"
lemma image_map2: "length t = length s \<Longrightarrow> g ` set (map2 f t s) = set (map2 (\<lambda>a b. g (f a b)) t s)"
lemma map2_tl: "length t = length s \<Longrightarrow> map2 f (tl t) (tl s) = tl (map2 f t s)"

lemma map_zip_assoc:
  "map f (zip (zip xs ys) zs) = map (\<lambda>(x, y, z). f ((x, y), z)) (zip xs (zip ys zs))"

lemma set_map2_ex:
  assumes "length t = length s"
  shows "set (map2 f s t) = {x. \<exists>i < length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}"
translations: lemma map2_empty_iff[simp]: "map2 f xs ys = [] \<longleftrightarrow> xs = [] \<or> ys = []"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Map2.map2 f xs ys = []) = (xs = [] \<or> ys = [])
by (metis Nil_is_map_conv list.exhaust list.simps(3) zip.simps(1) zip_Cons_Cons zip_Nil)
lemma image_map2: "length t = length s \<Longrightarrow> g ` set (map2 f t s) = set (map2 (\<lambda>a b. g (f a b)) t s)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. length t = length s \<Longrightarrow>
    g ` set (Map2.map2 f t s) =
    set (Map2.map2 (\<lambda>a b. g (f a b)) t s)
by auto
lemma map2_tl: "length t = length s \<Longrightarrow> map2 f (tl t) (tl s) = tl (map2 f t s)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. length t = length s \<Longrightarrow>
    Map2.map2 f (tl t) (tl s) = tl (Map2.map2 f t s)
by (metis (no_types, lifting) hd_Cons_tl list.sel(3) map2_empty_iff map_tl tl_Nil zip_Cons_Cons)

lemma map_zip_assoc:
  "map f (zip (zip xs ys) zs) = map (\<lambda>(x, y, z). f ((x, y), z)) (zip xs (zip ys zs))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. map f (zip (zip xs ys) zs) =
    Map2.map2 (\<lambda>x (y, z). f ((x, y), z)) xs (zip ys zs)
by (induct zs arbitrary: xs ys) (auto simp add: zip.simps(2) split: list.splits)

lemma set_map2_ex:
  assumes "length t = length s"
  shows "set (map2 f s t) = {x. \<exists>i < length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}"
proof (rule; rule)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}
 2. \<And>x.
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t.
                      x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)} \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)
fix x

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}
 2. \<And>x.
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t.
                      x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)} \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)
assume "x \<in> set (map2 f s t)"

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}
 2. \<And>x.
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t.
                      x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)} \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)
obtain i where i_p: "i < length (map2 f s t) \<and> x = map2 f s t ! i"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>i.
        i < length (Map2.map2 f s t) \<and>
        x = Map2.map2 f s t ! i \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (metis in_set_conv_nth)

proof (state)
this:
  i < length (Map2.map2 f s t) \<and> x = Map2.map2 f s t ! i

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}
 2. \<And>x.
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t.
                      x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)} \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)
from i_p

proof (chain)
picking this:
  i < length (Map2.map2 f s t) \<and> x = Map2.map2 f s t ! i
have "i < length t"

proof (prove)
using this:
  i < length (Map2.map2 f s t) \<and> x = Map2.map2 f s t ! i

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. i < length t
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  i < length t

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}
 2. \<And>x.
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t.
                      x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)} \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  i < length t

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}
 2. \<And>x.
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t.
                      x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)} \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)
from this i_p

proof (chain)
picking this:
  i < length t
  i < length (Map2.map2 f s t) \<and> x = Map2.map2 f s t ! i
have "x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  i < length t
  i < length (Map2.map2 f s t) \<and> x = Map2.map2 f s t ! i

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  i < length t
  i < length (Map2.map2 f s t) \<and> x = Map2.map2 f s t ! i
  length t = length s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}
 2. \<And>x.
       x \<in> {x. \<exists>i<length t.
                      x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)} \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in> set (Map2.map2 f s t)
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  i < length t
  x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)
show "x \<in> {x. \<exists>i < length t. x = f (s ! i) (t ! i)}"
using assms

proof (prove)

goal (1 subgoal):
